thread.title: BRIEF-Augusta Capital Updates On Development Agreement With Airways Corporation Of New Zealand Ltd​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Augusta Capital Updates On Development Agreement With Airways Corporation Of New Zealand Ltd​

organizations.name: brief-augusta capital updates on development agreement with airways corporation of new zealand ltd

text:
Jan 31 (Reuters) - Augusta Capital Ltd:
* REFERS TO ANNOUNCEMENT ‍REGARDING ENTRY INTO DEVELOPMENT AGREEMENT WITH AIRWAYS CORPORATION OF NEW ZEALAND LTD​
* NEW SINGLE ASSET FUND BEING CREATED TO RAISE REQUIRED CAPITAL FOR RE-DEVELOPMENT; AMOUNT OF EQUITY PROPOSED TO BE RAISED NZ$22.75 MILLION
* ‍DEVELOPMENT AGREEMENT WITH AIRWAYS CORPORATION OF NEW ZEALAND​ LTD IS NOW UNCONDITIONAL
* CO WILL UNDERWRITE NZ$15 MILLION OF TOTAL PROPOSED EQUITY OF FUND WITH A THIRD PARTY TO UNDERWRITE BALANCE​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
